languages.text: "Помилуйте! Только совершенный безумец пойдет на такой отчаянный демарш против владел{mf|ьца|ицы} мира!"

traits.locale_text: "Помилуйте! Только совершенный безумец пойдет на такой отчаянный демарш против владел{mf|ьца|ицы} мира!"

languages.text: "Please! Only a complete madman would resort to such a reckless stunt against the sovereign of this world!"
languages.original_text: "Помилуйте! Только совершенный безумец пойдет на такой отчаянный демарш против владел{mf|ьца|ицы} мира!"

traits.locale_text: "Please! Only a complete madman would resort to such a reckless stunt against the sovereign of this world!"
"Please! Only a complete madman would resort to such a reckless stunt against the sovereign of this world!"
"Please! Only a complete madman would resort to such a reckless stunt against the sovereign of this world!"
"Please! Only a complete madman would resort to such a reckless stunt against the sovereign of this world!"

languages.text: 「まったく！この星の統治者にあんなバカな真似するなんて、完全にイカれた奴に決まってる！」
languages.original_text: "Please! Only a complete madman would resort to such a reckless stunt against the sovereign of this world!"

traits.locale_text: 「まったく！この星の統治者にあんなバカな真似するなんて、完全にイカれた奴に決まってる！」

languages.text: “求你了！只有彻头彻尾的疯子，才会对这个世界的统治者做出如此鲁莽的举动！”
languages.original_text: "Please! Only a complete madman would resort to such a reckless stunt against the sovereign of this world!"

traits.locale_text: “求你了！只有彻头彻尾的疯子，才会对这个世界的统治者做出如此鲁莽的举动！”

languages.text: «¡Por favor! ¡Solo a un loco se le ocurriría atacar abiertamente a la soberana de este mundo!».
languages.original_text: "Please! Only a complete madman would resort to such a reckless stunt against the sovereign of this world!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Por favor! ¡Solo a un loco se le ocurriría atacar abiertamente a la soberana de este mundo!».

languages.text: "Also wirklich! Nur ein komplett Wahnsinniger würde eine so waghalsige Aktion gegen {mf|den Souverän|die Souveränin} dieser Welt durchführen!"
languages.original_text: "Please! Only a complete madman would resort to such a reckless stunt against the sovereign of this world!"

traits.locale_text: "Also wirklich! Nur ein komplett Wahnsinniger würde eine so waghalsige Aktion gegen {mf|den Souverän|die Souveränin} dieser Welt durchführen!"

languages.text: « Voyons, il faudrait avoir complètement perdu la tête pour attenter à la vie {mf|du souverain|de la souveraine} de ce monde ! »
languages.original_text: "Please! Only a complete madman would resort to such a reckless stunt against the sovereign of this world!"

traits.locale_text: « Voyons, il faudrait avoir complètement perdu la tête pour attenter à la vie {mf|du souverain|de la souveraine} de ce monde ! »

languages.text: "Lütfen! Bu dünyanın hükümdarına karşı böyle pervasız bir şeye anca delinin teki kalkışır!"
languages.original_text: "Please! Only a complete madman would resort to such a reckless stunt against the sovereign of this world!"

traits.locale_text: "Lütfen! Bu dünyanın hükümdarına karşı böyle pervasız bir şeye anca delinin teki kalkışır!"
